metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2183 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: In generateServicesMap of RegisteredServicesCache.java, there is a possible account protection bypass due to a caching optimization. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-9 Android-10Android ID: A-136261465

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
